SELECT A.CODE AS taskGb, A.CODE_NM AS taskNm, IFNULL(B.ACHIEVECNT,0) AS achieveCnt, IFNULL(B.TASKALL,0) AS taskAll FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE AS A INNER JOIN (SELECT P.TASK_GB, COUNT(CASE WHEN D.ACHIEVEMENT_RATE=100 THEN 1 END) AS ACHIEVECNT, COUNT(P.TASK_GB) AS TASKALL FROM DEV_PLAN_TB AS D, PG_TB AS P WHERE D.PG_ID = P.PG_ID AND P.USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY TASK_GB) AS B ON A.CODE = B.TASK_GB WHERE A.CODE_ID = 'TASKGB' ORDER BY taskAll DESC
